# Week 1

```{r}
#| echo: false

par(mfrow = c(1,2))
x <- rnbinom(n = 100, size = 2, mu = 10)
hist(x)
hist(log(x+1))

mean_x <- mean(x)
var_x <- var(x)
```

We sample random variables with given mean and dispersion. Afterwards we calculate mean, which is `r mean_x` and variance, which is `r var_x`
